pronunciation.pinyin: shuō nǐ pàng nǐ jiù chuǎn
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shuo1 ni3 pang4 ni3 jiu4 chuan3

meanings.value: lit. when someone tells you you're fat, you pant (as if you were actually fat)
fig. Hey! I pay you a compliment, and you start bragging! (typically jocular and teasing)
flattery, like perfume, should be smelled, not swallowed
